Name: Forest Of Relics
About the game: The Forest of Relics where many historical sites and relics exist. It was a place visited by many treasure hunters because it had treasures with high value and relics with mysterious power. And Treasure Hunter Ruby finds the key to the ruins that her heart has been attracted to for a long time and starts exploring... [How to play] Use the Run / Jump / Hanging / Paragliding to pass through various obstacles and obtain treasures. Spinel, the guardian of the ruins, is testing you. [Game Features] ▷ Charming characters ▷ Various traps and terrain features ▷ Save Point ▷ Exciting cutscenes ▷ Time Attack ▷ Play time: 1 to 2 hours
